name: Just. Download.
short_description: Simple torrent downloader that bridges Torznab indexers with Transmission.
description: Simple torrent downloader that bridges Torznab indexers with Transmission. Just. Download. is a self-hosted application focused on media, torrent, download, p2p. It can be deployed on any device via Docker Compose.
usecases: Self-host Just. Download. on your home server to simple torrent downloader that bridges torznab indexers with transmission without depending on third-party cloud services.
Use Just. Download. to manage your media workflows privately, keeping all data under your control on local infrastructure.
